product_name: Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball Bunting - Toddler Girls'
long_description: When Old Man Winter blows into town, keep your toddler girl warm, comfortable and happy in the Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball bunting. Use of recycled materials makes Mother Earth happy too. Wind-resistant 100% recycled polyester fabric with Durable Water Repellent treatment resists snags and moisture. 90% recycled Thermogreen(R) insulation uses thermally-bonded fibers to provide a high level of warmth with minimal weight; insulation holds heat even when damp. Spandex trim around hood, sleeves and leg cuffs helps retain heat; hand covers allow full extension of little arms while keeping hands warm. Easy-entry front zipper with draft flap won't let heat sneak out; it opens wide for easy dressing and diaper changes. Reversible design with contrasting quilt stitching doubles your options. The Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball bunting has a relaxed fit to accommodate layers. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
